Translation.Page About: Suno API AI Music Generator is a free AI music generation software, calling the existing API interface to achieve AI music generation. If you have any questions, please contact wechat: 18942907527
Translation.Page Header: Create your own unique Suno AI music song now, use it for free and enjoy the fun of innovative AI music generation!
Translation.Title: Song Title:
Translation.Title Desc: Please enter the song name, with a maximum of 100 words.
Translation.Tags Desc: Please enter the music style, with a maximum of 200 words.
Translation.Prompt Desc: Please enter your lyrics, up to a maximum of 1000 words.
Translation.Title Placeholder: Give your music songs a name to identify, share, and discover.
Translation.Tags Placeholder: Describe the style of music what you want (e.g. : Chinese pop). Suno AI's models don't recognize artists by name, but understand genres and atmos.
Translation.Prompt Placeholder: Enter your own lyrics, or various existing lyrics, professional lyric assistance tools: https://poe.com/SuperSunoMaster.
Translation.Desc Value: Directly enter your desired style of music and theme, and create professional quality Suno AI music songs with one click!
Translation.Desc Reamrk: Describe the style of music and theme you want (e.g. : Acoustic pop music about the holidays). Use genres and atmospheres rather than specific artists and songs.
Translation.DescPrompt Error: Please enter the song description, for example: write a song similar to the style of 'Nocturne' called 'Nocturne: Take the Stage to Receive Awards'.
Translation.Custom Title Error: Please enter the title of the song, for example: Nocturne on stage to accept the award.
Translation.Custom Tags Error: Please enter the style of music, for example, Chinese pop.
Translation.Custom Prompt Error: Please enter your own lyrics, if not you can enter a keyword word, then click Generate Lyrics.
Translation.Generate Submit Error: Suno AI Music song generation submission failedï¼š
Translation.Generate Status Error: Suno AI Music song generation status failedï¼š
Translation.Fetch Status Progress: Suno AI Music song generation Please wait...
Translation.Fetch Status Running: Suno AI Music song is being generatedï¼š
Translation.Fetch Status Success: Suno AI Music song generation successï¼š
Translation.Generate Success: Suno AI Music song generation success!
Translation.Identity Placeholder: Enter your ID to identify e.g. : Email account.
Translation.Identity Help: Please enter your Email account to identify yourself.
Translation.Session Placeholder: Enter your Session to use free generated music.
Translation.Session Help: Please enter your Session to use the free music generation.
Translation.Cookie Placeholder: Enter your Cookie to use free music generation.
Translation.Cookie Help: Please enter your Cookie to generate music for free.
Translation.TokenAuth Error: Please save the information first, and then refresh the page to use it normally!
Translation.FeedID Placeholder: Please enter the generated music feed ID, click get to display.
Translation.FeedID Help: Please enter the generated music feed ID, click get to display.
Translation.FetchFeed FeedID Empty: Please enter the generated music feed ID.
Translation.FetchFeed FeedID Error: The music feed ID format is incorrect.
Translation.FetchFeed Error: Suno AI music feed information obtained failed:
Translation.FetchFeed Success: Suno AI music feed information obtained success!
